entry.title: Saturday: A few flurries. High minus 2.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending this afternoon then cloudy. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 21 this morning and minus 8 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Saturday 18 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 6. POP 60%
